title: Goldman Sachs | Associate | Bengaluru | Need Help
content:
Education: Bachelors in Computer Engineering (Tier - 3)
Years of Experience: 3.10 Years
Prior Experience: Mid-Size Product Based Company
Previous Salary : 16L Base + 2L Variable
Date of the Offer: Sept 2024
Company: Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: Associate
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: INR 28L
Relocation: INR 2L
Relocation Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: INR 5,00,000 to 6,00,000 Variable Pay
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~INR 33 to 34 LPA
Other details: This is my first offer. Expecting an offer from Target in couple of days

Looks like I am lowballed. Please provide suggestions on accepting/negoatiating for this offer. I have not accepted the offer yet. Shall I accept it right away and negotiate later?

title: Nielsen Media
content:
Years of Experience: 6yr
Current Compensation - 27 fix + 6 bonus + 2stocks = 35 per year
Correct Company : Fortune 50, retail, PBC
Date of the Offer: sept 2024
Company: NIELSEN
Title/Level: MTS 3 
Location: bengaluru
Salary: 38L fix 
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 4 L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): around 44 with PF
Benefits: Term, Health and Accidental Insurance

Thinking of Rejecting this because I see bad reviews. Also I'm right now in PBC ( fortune 50) . Also, wrt staff engineer and responsibilities this is just tradeoff I feel.

Suggestions are welcome.....

title: SAP Labs India | Developer | Bengaluru | Offer
content:

comp-> 15 LPA(14 fixed,1 veriable).

title: Oracle | Associate SDE | Bangalore/Hyderabad/NCR
content:
* Education: B.Tech CSE from IIIT Bhubaneswar
* Prior Experience:
	* Intern at Dell Technologies - 2 months
	* Freelancer at Fiverr - 1.5 years
* Date of the Offer: September 2, 2024
* Company: Oracle
* Title/Level: Associate SDE
* Location: Bangalore/Hyderabad/NCR
* Salary: ₹14,50,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: ₹3,00,000
* Stock bonus: ₹16,78,656 with a 4 years vesting period. 25% redemption after each year.
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹21,69,664 + Applicable Gratuity
